title: Rotate Watch Face
summary: A jumping second hand while the shimmering numerals tells the times
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: This watch face is most definitely our standout luxury face for smart watch users, With 2 different color schemes with built in features like Date and battery status.FrillRoid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable. Key custom features:-• Latest Weather updates• Classic Design• Ultimate readability • Clean and simplistic look • Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
This watch face is most definitely our standout luxury face for smart watch users, With 2 different color schemes with built in features like Date and battery status.
FrillRoid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-
• Latest Weather updates
• Classic Design
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Add custom colour options and a way to get rid of the numbers being cut off I would like to see custom colour options, seeing as I paid for it that's what I'd expect. Also on my Moto 360 the numbers at the bottom are cut off because of the 'flat tyre' design which I kind of hate
Not working!!! Like mentioned by Andrew its not working or showing up on my watch or phone!! Is this a rip off?? Please explain?
Good face I noticed the face shifts off center, when in ambient mode, also when it's 12:00 the 12 comes out as 00 reading 00:00 please fix.
Twenty four hour format ???? Twenty four hour format not supported and wouldn't mind seeing some color adjustability and ambient setting time adjustability as well.
not as good as stock sorry
Beautiful watch face for square or circular Android smart watch
